SELECT OD_HACHU_MAIL.OD_HACHU_MAIL_ID , OD_HACHU_MAIL.OD_MK_ID , OD_HACHU_MAIL.TANTOUSHA , OD_HACHU_MAIL.TANTOU_MAIL_ADDRESS , OD_HACHU_MAIL.SUBJECT , OD_HACHU_MAIL.BIKOU , OD_HACHU_MAIL.RENEW_DATE , OD_HACHU_MAIL.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_HACHU_MAIL.TS FROM OD_HACHU_MAIL
WHERE OD_HACHU_MAIL.OD_MK_ID = :OD_MK_ID AND OD_HACHU_MAIL.TANTOUSHA = :TANTOUSHA AND OD_HACHU_MAIL.TANTOU_MAIL_ADDRESS = :TANTOU_MAIL_ADDRESS AND OD_HACHU_MAIL.SUBJECT = :SUBJECT

SELECT OD_HACHU_MAIL.OD_HACHU_MAIL_ID , OD_HACHU_MAIL.OD_MK_ID , OD_HACHU_MAIL.TANTOUSHA , OD_HACHU_MAIL.TANTOU_MAIL_ADDRESS , OD_HACHU_MAIL.SUBJECT , OD_HACHU_MAIL.BIKOU , OD_HACHU_MAIL.RENEW_DATE , OD_HACHU_MAIL.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_HACHU_MAIL.TS FROM OD_HACHU_MAIL
WHERE OD_HACHU_MAIL.OD_MK_ID = :OD_MK_ID
ORDER BY OD_HACHU_MAIL.RENEW_DATE DESC

INSERT INTO OD_HACHU_MAIL ( OD_HACHU_MAIL_ID , OD_MK_ID , TANTOUSHA , TANTOU_MAIL_ADDRESS , SUBJECT , BIKOU , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID ) VALUES ( :OD_HACHU_MAIL_ID , :OD_MK_ID , :TANTOUSHA , :TANTOU_MAIL_ADDRESS , :SUBJECT , :BIKOU , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID )

UPDATE OD_HACHU_MAIL SET OD_MK_ID = :OD_MK_ID , TANTOUSHA = :TANTOUSHA , TANTOU_MAIL_ADDRESS = :TANTOU_MAIL_ADDRESS , SUBJECT = :SUBJECT , BIKOU = :BIKOU , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE OD_HACHU_MAIL_ID = :OD_HACHU_MAIL_ID AND TS = :TS
